tns:patch.author: Octavian Ciubotaru
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_indicator_actual_comment; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_indicator_actual_comment AS SELECT con.activity_id AS amp_activity_id, val.comment_ AS name, ind.indicator_id AS me_indicator_id, si.amp_sector_id AS me_indicator_sector_id, CASE ind.type WHEN 'A' THEN 1 :: BIGINT WHEN 'D' THEN 2 :: BIGINT ELSE 3 :: BIGINT END AS me_indicator_type_id, con.ind_val_category AS me_indicator_logframe_id, con.risk AS me_indicator_risk_id FROM amp_indicator_connection con JOIN amp_indicator ind ON ind.indicator_id = con.indicator_id LEFT JOIN amp_sector_indicator si ON si.indicator_id=ind.indicator_id JOIN amp_indicator_values val ON val.ind_connect_id = con.id WHERE val.value_type = 1 AND con.sub_clazz::text = 'a'::text;
